name: ContraForce
headline: Hyperautomated Incident Remediation Platform
description: ContraForce has developed a first of its kind hyperautomated security platform that enables automated security engineering, AI-operator workflows, and incident response velocity at scale.

founders.name: Stanislav Golubchik, Founder
founders.description: Stan Golubchik is CEO and Co-Founder of ContraForce. He has been in the IT and Cybersecurity space for 15 years. Bringing extensive experience in executive roles at McAfee, and Armor Cloud Security. Stan started his career working in a NOC and found his footing in cybersecurity when joining Intel Security. He possess several certifications and is passionate of building future innovation and leaders within the space.

founders.name: Ricky Melendez, Founder
founders.description: Ricky Melendez is CTO and Co-Founder of ContraForce. He has been in the IT and Cybersecurity space for 10 years. He brings extensive experience in building Security Operation Centers from the ground up in McAfee, and leading security teams in Armor Cloud. Ricky graduated from UT Austin with a focus on computation mathematics and computer science.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/629349c62d0c46d5cbaa91bf_Vector%2056.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/629349c62d0c46d5cbaa91bf_Vector%2056.svg)
# **Security Service****Delivery Platform**
Meet the Security Service Delivery Platform (SSDP), designed just for service providers like you. Say goodbye to costly customer onboardings, enable your security analysts to scale, and deliver a high margin Managed Detection & Response (MDR) service. 
[Get a demo](https://www.contraforce.com/</get-started>)
![Security Service Delivery Platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/664227fb2b2fa8651170576b_Excellence%20Award%20Winner%20-%20CF.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/62910df96ab42ae28085d513_light.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/62910d029f38b1c8f5d0cbbc_LB.png)
# **Deliver Lightning-Fast Managed Detection & Response**
With ContraForce, you can now handle all your customers’ security incidents from the cloud to endpoint in one place. Plus, you can automate security incident response and detection rule management to deliver profitable MDR services. 
![Built for Service Providers](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c0c75b896754398185d29f_LF-Service-Provider.svg)
Built for Service Providers
Building or enhancing your MDR delivery? Access predictable pricing with a platform architected for your operational and compliance needs at scale.
![Microsoft Security Activated](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c0c7873d7be62423a0d486_LF-Streamlined.svg)
Connect and Onboard Fast
Self-service onboarding and deploy with customers in minutes. Show immediate value and win customers over through a platform where you're the hero. 
![Automated Incident Guidance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c0c799748a66371469dc77_LF-AI-Guided.svg)
Force Multiply Your Analysts
Automate co-managed security incident response for your team. Reduce the pivots required to identify root cause and increase your alert handling volume. 
![Secure Multi-Tenancy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c0c7b533154010f4fab6f0_LF-Multi-Tenant.svg)
Manage EDR and SIEM Platforms
With multi-tenant security incident management for your customer's EDR and SIEM platforms, you can meet your customers where they are at today.
## Simplify your security operations 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/62930acaf07b5e99c92d5335_Vector.svg)
### **Automate Your Security Tools, Unleash Your Security Service Practice**
90%
Reduced time and effort to manage Microsoft Sentinel
85%
Reduced screen time and pivots to other portals 
40%
Increase of your Security Operations profit margin
![Unified investigation experience](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65e5f7b89d77cae3fa5d50d0_product-slider-thumb1R1.png)
![Pre-built response actions for any incident](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c1158979378d9a118aa6fc_product-slider-thumb2.png)
![Detection and response at scale](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65e5f984aebd47b14a9607a0_product-slider-thumb3R1.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c1f211f6371a9c4a2d7edd_shape-slider.svg)
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c1157d2562bc6acb9b3d79_product-slider-icon1.svg)
###### Investigate across customers fast 
Managing security incidents across multiple customers with various EDR and SIEM tools is painful. With ContraForce, you can now manage multi-tenant security investigations seamlessly while meeting compliance requirements.
![Unified investigation experience](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65e5f7b89d77cae3fa5d50d0_product-slider-thumb1R1.png)
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c1157db03b1d253a83e588_product-slider-icon2.svg)
###### Automate co-managed incident response 
Team up and coloborate across organizations to mange security incidents in a single view. Within minutes you can run co-managed remediation actions to disrupt attacks across managed users, endpoints network, and cloud.
![Pre-built response actions for any incident](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c1158979378d9a118aa6fc_product-slider-thumb2.png)
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c1157dbbf8a36ca75674e5_product-slider-icon3.svg)
###### Build incident response flows
A visual entity map pinpoints the assets that are under threat. Click to build incident response flows into reusable snapshots to disrupt the threat and cover your rear.
![Detection and response at scale](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65e5f984aebd47b14a9607a0_product-slider-thumb3R1.png)

# **Security Service****Delivery Platform**
Meet the Security Service Delivery Platform (SSDP), designed just for service providers like you. Say goodbye to costly customer onboardings, enable your security analysts to scale, and deliver a high margin Managed Detection & Response (MDR) service.

# **Deliver Lightning-Fast Managed Detection & Response**
With ContraForce, you can now handle all your customers’ security incidents from the cloud to endpoint in one place. Plus, you can automate security incident response and detection rule management to deliver profitable MDR services. 
![Built for Service Providers⟨29⟩]
Built for Service Providers
Building or enhancing your MDR delivery? Access predictable pricing with a platform architected for your operational and compliance needs at scale.
![Microsoft Security Activated⟨30⟩]
Connect and Onboard Fast
Self-service onboarding and deploy with customers in minutes. Show immediate value and win customers over through a platform where you're the hero. 
![Automated Incident Guidance⟨31⟩]
Force Multiply Your Analysts
Automate co-managed security incident response for your team. Reduce the pivots required to identify root cause and increase your alert handling volume. 
![Secure Multi-Tenancy⟨32⟩]
Manage EDR and SIEM Platforms
With multi-tenant security incident management for your customer's EDR and SIEM platforms, you can meet your customers where they are at today.

###### Investigate across customers fast 
Managing security incidents across multiple customers with various EDR and SIEM tools is painful. With ContraForce, you can now manage multi-tenant security investigations seamlessly while meeting compliance requirements.
![Unified investigation experience⟨33⟩]
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c1157db03b1d253a83e588_product-slider-icon2.svg)
###### Automate co-managed incident response 
Team up and coloborate across organizations to mange security incidents in a single view. Within minutes you can run co-managed remediation actions to disrupt attacks across managed users, endpoints network, and cloud.
![Pre-built response actions for any incident⟨34⟩]
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6290f98c568302d7a3f2442c/65c1157dbbf8a36ca75674e5_product-slider-icon3.svg)
###### Build incident response flows
A visual entity map pinpoints the assets that are under threat. Click to build incident response flows into reusable snapshots to disrupt the threat and cover your rear.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: ContraForce**

Founded in 2021 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S21, ContraForce is on a mission to redefine how security incidents are managed with its **Hyperautomated Incident Remediation Platform**. Located in McKinney, Texas, and comprising a tight-knit team of 15, ContraForce is pushing the boundaries of cybersecurity by integrating advanced automation and artificial intelligence.

**What They Do**

ContraForce has developed a groundbreaking security platform that facilitates automated security engineering and enhances incident response velocity at scale. Their offerings are particularly designed for Managed Service Providers (MSPs) and Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) looking to deliver exceptional security service excellence. The kernel of their platform is the **Security Service Delivery Platform (SSDP)**, which empowers these service teams to streamline operations, cut costs, and boost productivity without compromising quality.

Through features like self-service onboarding, co-managed security incident response, and integration of existing security tools, ContraForce helps its partners deliver Managed Detection and Response (MDR) services swiftly and efficiently. Essentially, they enable their clients to focus on critical tasks rather than getting bogged down by the complexities often associated with cybersecurity.

**Current Focus**

ContraForce is deeply invested in automating security processes, thus allowing organizations to respond to incidents quicker while increasing profitability. Their platform includes modules for integrations with existing security products, making it easier to elevate security operations without significant changes to the current stack.

**Partnerships and Growth**

With distinct tagging as 'SaaS', 'Security', and 'AI', ContraForce is targeting the evolving nature of cybersecurity, emphasizing proactive measures over reactive responses. They have established strategic partnerships to enhance their service capabilities and foster growth, underscoring their commitment to collaboration in the cybersecurity ecosystem.

**Conclusion**

In a world where cybersecurity challenges are ever-evolving, ContraForce stands out by merging automation with human expertise to create a seamless experience for security teams. Their focus on efficiency and scalability makes them a compelling choice for service providers aiming to enhance their cybersecurity offerings. For those interested in exploring their solutions, more information can be found on their [website](https://www.contraforce.com).
